```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(dplyr)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")
```

```{r}
instacart = 
  instacart |> 
  as_tibble()
```

```{r}
instacart |> 
  count(aisle) |> 
  arrange(desc(n))|>
  slice(1:25) |>
  plot_ly(x = ~aisle, y = ~n, color = ~aisle, type = "bar")
```

```{r}
box_cart <- sample_n(instacart, 500) |>
  mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, order_hour_of_day)) |>
  plot_ly(y = ~order_hour_of_day, color = ~aisle, type = "box")

box_cart
```
